content: अप्रधान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Subordinate, secondary, inferior; आवां तावदप्रधानौ <ls>H. 2.</ls> --नं (°ता, °त्वं) {@--1@} Subordinate or secondary state, inferiority. {@--2@} A secondary or subordinate act. (The word अप्रधान usually occurs in the neuter gender either by itself, or as an attribute to a noun, or as last member of <ab>comp.</ab>).
